title: Megalosporaceae
text:
The Megalosporaceae are a <a href="family%20%28taxonomy%29">family</a> of mostly <a href="lichen">lichen</a>-forming <a href="fungus">fungi</a> belonging to the <a href="class%20%28taxonomy%29">class</a> <a href="Lecanoromycetes">Lecanoromycetes</a> in the <a href="division%20%28mycology%29">division</a> <a href="Ascomycota">Ascomycota</a>. Most species have a tropical distribution. The family contains three <a href="genera">genera</a> ("<a href="Megaloblastenia">Megaloblastenia</a>", 
"<a href="Megalospora">Megalospora</a>", and "<a href="Sipmaniella">Sipmaniella</a>") and 38 species.
